mapper.insert: insert into "activity" (name, description, startDateTime, endDateTime, audit_status, created_at, created_by) values (#{name}, #{description}, #{startDateTime}, #{endDateTime}, #{auditStatus}, now(), #{createdBy});
mapper.update: update "activity" set audit_status = #{audit_status} -- NOTE 注意只能审核一次 where id = #{id} AND audit_status = 0
